about_the_game:
About This Game

Welcome to TerraCube, where your goal is to terraform cube-shaped planets while racing against the clock! In TerraCube, you'll tackle over 20 unique minigames, each presenting a different challenge that will test your skills and strategy. From puzzles to action-packed tasks, there's something for everyone.

Key Features:


-Time-Paced Gameplay: Earn trophies as fast as you can! The quicker and better you perform, the more trophies you'll gain. It’s all about speed and precision.

-Future Updates: We’re committed to expanding TerraCube with more lands and features in future updates. Stay tuned for exciting new content!

-Online Leaderboard: Compete against players worldwide! See how you stack up on the online leaderboard and strive to reach the top.

-Weekly Challenges: Test your skills with new weekly challenges. Keep the gameplay fresh and exciting with regularly updated content.

-Diverse Minigames: Enjoy a wide variety of games, each with its own set of rules and challenges. Whether you’re solving puzzles, strategizing, or showing off your quick reflexes, you’ll find something that suits your style.

-Adventure Mode:
-Items and Strategy: Use trophies to buy items that help you in the game. But be strategic—spend wisely to ensure you have what you need for the tougher challenges ahead.

-Inventory: The lands that show up in the shop are now lands from your inventory! You can collect more lands or remove them based on how you would like to play!

-Different Goals: Each area has multiple different goals you need to complete in order to get rewards. These can be from getting a certain amount of trophies to trying to get one planet to have all the same type of land.

-Medals: Enhance the gameplay by collecting medals, which stick with you throughout your run! These powerful items can really make or break a run if you can get them!

-Dangers: Get far enough in a run, and you'll encounter some dangers! These are effects that happen in specific star formations (levels) you reach. Sometimes a Rock Land will spawn and get in your way, or a constant wind will blow, slowly moving your camera!

Get ready to immerse yourself in the world of TerraCube and show off your speed and strategy skills. Can you master all the minigames, complete the goals, and become the ultimate terraformer?

Minimum:

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Race against the clock to terraform cube-shaped planets and tackle over 20 unique minigames, each offering a different challenge to test your skills and strategy. Earn trophies in quick, time-paced games, and use them wisely to buy new lands and tackle even more goals.
